report.title: UKBMS Visit Summary list
report.description: A list of the number of sites and visits recorded for each species, with filters for user, date start and end.
report.query: select #columns# from cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl JOIN occurrences o ON o.taxa_taxon_list_id = cttl.id AND o.deleted = false AND #website_filter# JOIN samples s ON o.sample_id=s.id and s.deleted=false JOIN samples p ON s.parent_id = p.id AND p.deleted = false JOIN locations l ON p.location_id = l.id AND l.deleted = false #joins# WHERE #website_filter#

param.name: date_from
param.description: If not provided, defaults to the start of the current year

param.name: date_to
param.description: If not provided, defaults to the end of the current year

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the user, or leave blank for all users
